column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I'm sorry to hear that your experience with Jinya's authenticity is "lacking."  Jinya was founded by our CEO Tomonori Takahashi.  He owns several restaurants in Ebisu
column2: Japan and brought the concept to the US several years ago.  We try make the taste of our ramen as authentic as possible.  Perhaps you just got a bowl that wasn't good.  Should you visit again in the near future
column3: please message me and I will make sure I am there to cook you a bowl of ramen that meets your every expectation.
